text: The men's shot put event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 16 July. A 6kg (junior implement) shot was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Edis Elkasević ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sean
